scripts.audit: true && test-apt-packages || true && npm run test || true
scripts.test: npm run test-node-packages && npm run test-format && npm run test-markdown && npm run test-spell
scripts.test-node-packages: npm doctor || npm outdated || npm audit
scripts.test-apt-packages: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade --dry-run
scripts.ci: npm run test-spell && npm run test-format && npm run test-markdown
scripts.ci-format: git status --porcelain | awk '{print $2}' | xargs npm run base-format -- --check
scripts.ci-spell: git status --porcelain | awk '{print $2}' | xargs npm run base-spell --
scripts.ci-packages: npm install && npm prune && npm dedupe
scripts.pre-commit: npm run fix-format && npm run test-spell
scripts.fix: npm run fix-packages && npm run fix-spell && npm run fix-format
scripts.fix-packages: npm update && npm prune && npm dedupe
scripts.fix-apt-packages: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade --dry-run && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
